content.p: We want to make sure that everyone at the University is treated with the respect and fairness they deserve. If you feel you have been bullied, harassed or treated unfairly, we will help you to manage the issue. We understand that dealing with problems can be a stressful experience. We generally find that discussing complaints openly and informally between the parties involved is the best approach. Grievance and dignity procedures If you believe that you have a grievance or feel your dignity is not being respected, itâ€™s important to talk to someone quickly. Who can I talk to?
